statements: DELETE FROM market_surveillance_transactions WHERE ticker_symbol = 'AAPL' AND transaction_type = 'BUY';
DELETE FROM market_surveillance_transactions WHERE ticker_symbol = 'AAPL' AND transaction_type = 'SELL';
DELETE FROM regulatory_entities WHERE regulatory_status = 'Approved' AND entity_country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE id = 10 AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM traders WHERE country = 'USA' AND registration_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM market_participants WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE product_id = 123 AND amount > 100.50;
